page.title: 10BUSHEY"FRIDAY INVADERS"CLUB
page.content:
This club is for 8 to 13 year olds. It was started by{P.C. Moxley}a local policeman who thought children had nothing to do at night. There are many activities such as {discos, sports, outings, darts, pool, {and table-tennis.
At the moment,the number of people going to the club is{about 200. The club needs more equipment but it does not have enough money. The parents help to raise money by holding{jumble-sales.}Everything that happens goes down in the{log book}how much money they have,what they do, who attends,and people who misbehave. Even though some people would like even more things to do, most agree that it is {GREAT}!
